name: fullstack-agents
title: Fullstack Agents
description: Unified fullstack development plugin with 28 specialized AI agents for code generation, review, analysis, scaffolding, debugging, and optimization. Supports FastAPI, Next.js, Docker, Celery, and APScheduler with interactive dialogue and smart pattern detection.

commands.name: analyze
commands.description: Analyze codebase, architecture, dependencies, or patterns

commands.name: generate
commands.description: Generate entities, pages, or components with interactive dialogue
commands.usage: /generate [type] [name] - Options: entity, page, data-table, api-route, task, job, docker-service, fullstack

commands.name: scaffold
commands.usage: /scaffold [type] - Options: fastapi, nextjs, backend-module, frontend-module, docker

commands.name: review
commands.description: Review code for quality, security, performance, or patterns

commands.name: debug
commands.description: Debug errors, analyze logs, or profile performance

commands.name: optimize
commands.description: Optimize code for performance or cleanliness

commands.name: status
commands.description: Show project detection status and available actions
